Sentencas: The hybrid direct carbon fuel cell (HDCFC) with solid oxide and molten carbonate binary electrolyte merges solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and molten carbonate fuel cell technologies to achieve direct conversion of solid carbon to electric power.
Titulo: Electrochemical oxidation of solid carbon in hybrid DCFC with solid oxide and molten carbonate binary electrolyte

Sentencas: The purpose of this study is to investigate in detail the electrochemistry of the oxidation of solid carbon in the carbon/carbonate slurry in the HDCFC.
Titulo: Electrochemical oxidation of solid carbon in hybrid DCFC with solid oxide and molten carbonate binary electrolyte

Sentencas: A planar test cell has been fabricated employing conventional SOFC materials and a eutectic carbonate mixture of lithium carbonate and potassium carbonate.
Titulo: Electrochemical oxidation of solid carbon in hybrid DCFC with solid oxide and molten carbonate binary electrolyte

Sentencas: The HDCFC with a model fuel, carbon black XC-72R, shows very high open circuit voltages (OCVs), approximately 1.5 V at 550-700 degrees C, especially after a high temperature operation at 900 degrees C, where carbonate decomposes to O2- and CO2.
Titulo: Electrochemical oxidation of solid carbon in hybrid DCFC with solid oxide and molten carbonate binary electrolyte

Sentencas: The carbon/carbonate slurry increases the active reaction zone from a two-dimensional Ni/YSZ anode to a three-dimensional slurry and significantly enhances the carbon oxidation.
Titulo: Electrochemical oxidation of solid carbon in hybrid DCFC with solid oxide and molten carbonate binary electrolyte

Sentencas: The high OCV is probably due to the low activity of CO2 in the slurry, which results from the recombination of CO2 and O2-.
Titulo: Electrochemical oxidation of solid carbon in hybrid DCFC with solid oxide and molten carbonate binary electrolyte

Sentencas: Gaseous products were analysed using an online gas chromatograph, and CO2 and CO were detected, with their selectivity found to be dependent on temperature.
Titulo: Electrochemical oxidation of solid carbon in hybrid DCFC with solid oxide and molten carbonate binary electrolyte

Sentencas: Solid carbon is electrochemically oxidised to CO2 and the final distribution of the products is dominated by the equilibrium of the Boudouard reaction (C + CO2 reversible arrow 2CO).
Titulo: Electrochemical oxidation of solid carbon in hybrid DCFC with solid oxide and molten carbonate binary electrolyte
